start.text: Okay, the interaction has to be contained inside the game

2.text: I think that's a crucial addition to your definition

3.text: A game is a closed system with any type of interaction

4.text: But, then again, that encapsulates a lot of things

5.text: Like before, books, music player with a play button, a coal mine where you swing axes, they don't sound like games to me

6.text: Maybe I have to ask you one more thing
